title: Japanese Football Star-Turned-Venture Capitalist Keisuke Honda Is Hot On AI
description: After raising $100 million, Honda’s low-profile VC firm, X&KSK, has invested in a maker of AI-powered humanoids and a nuclear fusion startup.
content:
Keisuke Honda at the Forbes Global CEO Conference 2025 in Jakarta.
